ygData.subject: RE: New NPC's
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I should have said a couple of months ago.  Time goes by fast in EQ ... new to me at level 19 when I had been in Paw ever since level 12 (not staying
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I should have said a couple of months ago. Time goes by fast in EQ
:) I have been level 20 and 21 for almost a month and a half now. Nixx was
new to me at level 19 when I had been in Paw ever since level 12 (not
staying there, just kept going back). So when you see something for the
first time after being in an area for a long time you are going to call it
'new'.

> ----------
> From: Brian Dickens[SMTP:briandickens@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 1:16 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] New NPC's
>
> From: Brian Dickens <briandickens@...>
>
> Nixx Nenix - or whatever his name is - is not new. He killed me in Paw
> a few months ago. He has been on my list of NPCs to kill for quite some
> time.
>
> -----------
>
> "I found the same thing in Paw a couple of weeks ago. There was a
> darkelf necromancer named Nixx Nenix roaming Paw. I was just coming
> out after
> successfully defeating Shaman Ren Rex and saw a dark elf swimming. I
> figured it was another player until he tagged with a damage over
> time(DOT). I made it to the zone before he could catch me and zoned out
> and theDOT still took me down 3 and 1/2 bubbles of health (I had 571
> hit points at level 19)."
>
